trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for chart sheet host items in document-level Office projects for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级 Office 项目中图表工作表宿主项的基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase> class is the base class for chart sheet *host items* in document-level Office projects created by using Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>类是图表工作表的基类*主机项*通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Office 项目中。

trans-unit.source: A chart sheet is a worksheet that contains only a chart.
trans-unit.target: 图表工作表是只包含一个图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create an embedded chart in a worksheet that also contains other items, such as cells or other controls, create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要创建嵌入的图表中的工作表还包含其他项，例如单元格或其他控件，创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>相反。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase> class provides all the chart-related features of a native <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName> object in the Excel primary interop assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>类提供与图表相关的所有功能本机<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName>Excel 主互操作程序集中的对象。

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase> also exposes events.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>还公开事件。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Makes the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> the active chart.
trans-unit.target: 使当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 成为活动图表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> is activated.
trans-unit.target: 当激活 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ActivateEvent> event that displays a message box when the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is activated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ActivateEvent>显示一条消息的事件框中时当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>激活。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />，它表示 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />，表示 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Application%2A> property of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to display the application name in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Application%2A>属性的当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>来在消息框中显示的应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The file name for a chart template.
trans-unit.target: 图表模板的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Applies a standard or custom chart template to the chart.
trans-unit.target: 将标准或自定义图表模板应用于图表。

trans-unit.source: The type of data label to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的数据标签的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the legend key next to the point.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时，在点旁边显示图例项标示。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object automatically generates appropriate text based on content.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象自动根据内容生成适当的文本，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: For the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> and <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> objects, <see langword="true" /> if the series has leader lines.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> 和 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> 对象而言，如果系列包含引导线，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The series name for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的系列名称。

trans-unit.source: The category name for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的类别名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的值。

trans-unit.source: The percentage for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The bubble size for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的气泡大小。

trans-unit.source: The separator for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Applies data labels to a point, a series, or all the series in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 将数据标签应用于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中的点、系列或所有系列。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ApplyDataLabels%2A> method to show the data values in the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ApplyDataLabels%2A>方法来在当前显示的数据值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 10 that specifies the type of layout to apply to the chart.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 10 之间的一个整数，用于指定要应用于图表的布局的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified layout to the chart.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的布局应用于图表。

trans-unit.source: The values of the `Layout` parameter correspond to the available options on the **Chart Layouts** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 值`Layout`参数对应于可用的选项上**图表布局**组**设计**功能区上的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart.
trans-unit.target: **设计**选项卡选择图表后可用。

trans-unit.source: Each type of chart has its own set of layout options.
trans-unit.target: 每个类型的图表有自己的布局选项集。

trans-unit.source: For example, the layout options for a pie chart are different from the layout options for a column chart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，饼图的布局选项是柱形图的布局选项不同。

trans-unit.source: If you want to apply a layout from a different chart type, you can use the `ChartType` parameter to specify the chart type that the `Layout` parameter will refer to.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从不同的图表类型应用布局，则可以使用`ChartType`参数来指定图表键入`Layout`参数将引用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a column chart and you want to apply a layout from a line chart, pass the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType.xlLine?displayProperty=fullName> value to the `ChartType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个柱形图和你想要从折线图应用布局、 传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType.xlLine?displayProperty=fullName>值赋给`ChartType`参数。

trans-unit.source: The layout only adds chart elements that are available for that particular chart type.
trans-unit.target: 布局将只添加可用于该特定的图表类型的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例应用可用于图表工作表中的图图表类型的第 10 个布局`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A> method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A>方法应用更多布局更改： 设置图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式、 添加的水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为簇状的柱形二维图表工作表`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel scales a 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> so that it is closer in size to the equivalent 2-D chart
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否缩放三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 以使其大小更接近于等效的二维图表的大小

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Excel scales a 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> so that it is closer in size to the equivalent 2-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 缩放三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 以使其大小更接近于等效的二维图表的大小，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.RightAngleAxes%2A> property must be `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.RightAngleAxes%2A> 属性必须为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的轴。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> is valid only for 3-D charts).
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" />（<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> 只对三维图表有效）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis group.
trans-unit.target: 指定轴组。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the primary group is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用主轴组。

trans-unit.source: 3-D charts have only one axis group.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表只有一个轴组。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single axis or a collection of the axes on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示图表上的一个轴或一个轴集合。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Axes%2A> method to set the title of the primary axis of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Axes%2A>方法以设置当前的主轴标题<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示三维图表的背面墙。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> 对象，表示三维图表的背面墙。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BackWall%2A> property to format the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BackWall%2A>后三维图表的墙进行格式设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the colors of the walls and floor of an existing 3-D chart sheet and sets the chart style to style 4.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定墙和现有的三维图表工作表下限的颜色，并设置样式为样式 4 的图表。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, the workbook must contain a chart sheet called `Chart1` of a 3-D type.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，该工作簿必须包含图表工作表调用`Chart1`的三维类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape used with the 3-D bar or column <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于三维条形或柱形 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的形状。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBarShape" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBarShape" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BarShape%2A> property of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to display the bars as cylinders.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BarShape%2A>属性的当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>以显示类似于圆柱的条形图。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase> class extends <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet> objects by implementing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IChartSheetExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>类扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet>对象通过实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IChartSheetExtension>接口。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在双击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 时，但在默认双击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DoubleClick%2A> method does not cause this event to occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DoubleClick%2A>方法不会导致此事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BeforeDoubleClick> event that displays a message box when an axis of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BeforeDoubleClick>时显示一个消息框轴的当前事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>双击。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler to `true` so that the chart sheet does not receive the double click action when the user double-clicks an axis.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将`Cancel`的事件处理程序参数`true`，以便当用户双击轴，该图表工作表不会收到双击操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在右击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 时，但在默认右击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BeforeRightClick> event that displays a message box when the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is right-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.BeforeRightClick>显示一条消息的事件框中时当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>右键单击。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler to `true` so that the chart sheet does not receive the right click action.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将`Cancel`的事件处理程序参数`true`，因此该图表工作表不会收到右键单击操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> plots new or changed data.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 绘制新的或更改的数据后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Calculate> event that displays a message box when the source data of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> changes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Calculate>显示一条消息的事件框中时的当前的源数据<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> that represents the complete chart area for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的完整图表区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> that represents the complete chart area for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的完整图表区域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartArea%2A> property of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the weight and color of the chart area border.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartArea%2A>属性的当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>要修改的权重和图表区边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The chart group number.
trans-unit.target: 图表组编号。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single chart group (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> object) or a collection of all the chart groups in the chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> object).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示单个图表组（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> 对象）或图表中所有图表组的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection includes every type of group.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合包括所有类型的组。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartGroups%2A> method to set the distance between the bars of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartGroups%2A>方法以设置当前的栏之间的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: This argument can be an array, to specify more than one chart.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是一个数组，以指定多个图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single embedded chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> object) or a collection of all the embedded charts (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> object) on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示工作表上的单个嵌入式图表（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> 对象）或所有嵌入式图表的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: This method is not equivalent to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.Charts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是等效于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.Charts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method returns embedded charts; the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.Charts%2A> property returns chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回嵌入的图表;<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.Charts%2A>属性返回图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject.Chart%2A> property to return the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName> object for an embedded chart.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the chart.

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 48 that represents the style of the chart.

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartStyle%2A> property correspond to the available options on the **Chart Styles** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon.

trans-unit.source: The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart.
trans-unit.target: **设计**选项卡选择图表后可用。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Some chart types are not available for PivotChart reports.
trans-unit.target: 某些图表类型将不可用的数据透视图报表。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ChartType%2A>属性来设置类型与当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>为三维簇状条形图。

trans-unit.source: The range that contains the source data for the new chart.
trans-unit.target: 包含新图表的源数据的范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel edits the active chart sheet or the selected chart on the active worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 编辑活动图表工作表或在活动工作表上所选择的图表。

trans-unit.source: The chart type.
trans-unit.target: 图表类型。

trans-unit.source: The option number for the built-in autoformats.
trans-unit.target: 内置自动套用格式的选项编号。

trans-unit.source: Can be a number from 1 through 10, depending on the gallery type.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个 1 到 10 之间的数（取决于库类型）。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel chooses a default value based on the gallery type and data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 根据库类型和数据源选择默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the data for each series is in rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 指定每个系列的数据是按行绘制还是按列绘制。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the number of rows or columns within the source range that contain category labels.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定源范围中包含类别标签的行数或列数。

trans-unit.source: Legal values are from 0 (zero) through one less than the maximum number of the corresponding categories or series.
trans-unit.target: 合法值是从 0（零）到相应类别或系列的最大数减一。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows or columns within the source range that contain series labels.
trans-unit.target: 源范围中包含系列标签的行数或列数。

trans-unit.source: Legal values are from 0 (zero) through one less than the maximum number of the corresponding categories or series.
trans-unit.target: 合法值是从 0（零）到相应类别或系列的最大数减一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a legend.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时包含图例。

trans-unit.source: The chart title text.
trans-unit.target: 图表标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The category axis title text.
trans-unit.target: 分类轴标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The value axis title text
trans-unit.target: 数值轴标题文本

trans-unit.source: The series axis title for 3-D charts or the second value axis title for 2-D charts.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表的系列轴标题或二维图表的第二个数值轴标题。

trans-unit.source: Modifies the properties of the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 修改给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly format a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> without setting all the individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来快速设置的格式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>而无需设置所有单独的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is non-interactive, and it changes only the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是非交互式的，它只更改指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: If `Source` is omitted and either the selection is not an embedded chart on the active worksheet or the active sheet is not an existing chart, this method fails and an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Source`省略和任何一种选择不是在活动工作表或在活动工作表上的嵌入的图表不是现有图表，此方法将失败，发生错误。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the file name of the custom dictionary to be examined if the word is not found in the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指示未在主字典中找到单词时要检查的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the currently specified dictionary is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前指定的字典。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel ignore words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使 Microsoft Office Excel 忽略全部大写的单词。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel check words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" /> 可使 Microsoft Office Excel 检查全部大写的单词。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel display a list of suggested alternate spellings when an incorrect spelling is found.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示当发现不正确的拼写时让 Excel 显示建议的替换拼写列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to have Excel wait for you to input the correct spelling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使 Excel 等待您输入正确的拼写。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: The language of the dictionary being used.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的字典的语言。

trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> 属性使用的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>After</c> if you specify <c>Before</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>Before</c>，则不能指定 <c>After</c>。

trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`Before`或`After`，Microsoft Office Excel 创建新的工作簿包含复制的表。

trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Dispose%2A> method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Dispose%2A>方法自己。

trans-unit.source: When the document in a document-level customization is closed, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the customization.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭的文档级自定义项中的文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理使用自定义项的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Dispose%2A> method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Dispose%2A>方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the elevation of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的仰角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The elevation of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的仰角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Elevation%2A> property to set the elevation from which the view of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is calculated to 75 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Elevation%2A>要设置从其提升属性的当前视图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>计算为 75 度。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, using the naming convention of Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称（使用 Microsoft Office Excel 的命名约定）。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Microsoft Office Excel name to an object or a value.
trans-unit.target: 将 Microsoft Office Excel 名称转换为对象或值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 导出文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The language-independent name of the graphic filter as it appears in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 与语言无关的图形筛选器名称（如同其在注册表中所显示的那样）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the dialog box that contains the filter-specific options.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时，显示包含筛选器特定选项的对话框。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is <see langword="false" />, Microsoft Office Excel uses the default values for the filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 <see langword="false" />，则 Microsoft Office Excel 使用筛选器的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> in a graphic format.
trans-unit.target: 以图形格式导出 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Export%2A> method to export the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> as a .gif file without displaying the file options.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Export%2A>方法将导出当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>为.gif 文件而不显示文件选项。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> values that specifies whether to save the chart in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> 值之一，指定是以 PDF 还是 XPS 格式保存图表。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，Excel 会将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> values that specifies the quality of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> 值，该值指定导出文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the exported file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出的文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始导出的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, exporting starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to publish.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, publishing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则发布最后一页后停止发布。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file in the viewer immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即在查看器中打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the chart to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指针，指向使图表能够以其他固定格式保存的 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves the chart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中显示的图表。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Excel only after you install an add-in that provides this feature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Excel 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves one page of chart sheet `Chart1` in PDF format to the specified file path and file name using the standard quality resolution.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将保存的图表工作表的一页`Chart1`以 PDF 格式保存到指定的文件路径和文件的名称，使用标准质量分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The generated PDF file includes the workbook properties.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 PDF 文件包括工作簿属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a chart sheet named `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为图表工作表`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> object that represents the floor of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> 对象，该对象表示三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的基底。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> object that represents the floor of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> 对象，表示三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的基底。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Floor%2A> property to change the color of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> floor to green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Floor%2A>属性可以更改的当前颜色<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>floor 为绿色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the data series in a 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />, as a percentage of the marker width.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中的数据系列之间的距离（以标记宽度的百分比形式表示）。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the data series in a 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />, as a percentage of the marker width.
trans-unit.target: 三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中的数据系列之间的距离（以标记宽度的百分比形式表示）。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be between 0 and 500.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须介于 0 到 500 之间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.GapDepth%2A> property to set the distance between the data series in the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to 400 percent of the marker width.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.GapDepth%2A>属性设置中当前的数据序列之间的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>%到 400%标记宽度。

trans-unit.source: The X coordinate of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The Y coordinate of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.target: 该方法返回时，此参数包含指定坐标上的图表元素的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartItem" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Remarks" section.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the meaning of `Arg1` and `Arg2` after the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍的含义`Arg1`和`Arg2`该方法返回后。

trans-unit.source: Argument
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: AxisIndex
trans-unit.target: AxisIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the axis is primary or secondary.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否主或辅助轴。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlPrimary> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlSecondary>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> 常数之一：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlPrimary> 或 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlSecondary>。

trans-unit.source: AxisType
trans-unit.target: AxisType

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轴类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue>.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> 常数之一：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis> 或 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue>。

trans-unit.source: DropZoneType
trans-unit.target: DropZoneType

trans-unit.source: Specifies the drop zone type: column, data, page, or row field.
trans-unit.target: 指定的拖放区域类型： 列、 数据、 页上，或行字段。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlColumnField>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlPageField>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlRowField>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是以下之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation>常量： <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlColumnField>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlPageField>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlRowField>。

trans-unit.source: The column and row field constants specify the series and category fields, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 列和行字段常量分别指定序列和类别字段。

trans-unit.source: GroupIndex
trans-unit.target: GroupIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups?displayProperty=fullName> collection for a specific chart group.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups?displayProperty=fullName>特定图表组的集合。

trans-unit.source: PivotFieldIndex
trans-unit.target: PivotFieldIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields collection for a specific column (series), data, page, or row (category) field.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定列 （系列）、 数据、 页上，或行 （类别） 字段的 T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields 集合内的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: -1 if the drop zone type is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>.
trans-unit.target: 拖放区域类型是否为-1 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>。

trans-unit.source: PointIndex
trans-unit.target: PointIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Points> collection for a specific point within a series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Points>一系列中的特定点的集合。

trans-unit.source: A value of – 1 indicates that all data points are selected.
trans-unit.target: 值为 – 1 指示已选择所有数据点。

trans-unit.source: SeriesIndex
trans-unit.target: SeriesIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series> collection for a specific series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series>一系列特定的集合。

trans-unit.source: ShapeIndex
trans-unit.target: ShapeIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes> collection for a specific shape.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes>特定形状的集合。

trans-unit.source: TrendlineIndex
trans-unit.target: TrendlineIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Trendlines> collection for a specific trendline within a series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Trendlines>一系列中的特定趋势线的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.GetChartElement%2A> method to display the chart element when a user clicks the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.GetChartElement%2A>方法在用户单击图表时显示的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a specific axis exists on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示特定轴是否存在于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified axis exists on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上存在指定的轴，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A> property to hide or show a particular axis on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A>属性来隐藏或显示特定轴上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> values that specifies the axis type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType>指定轴类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Series axes apply only to 3-D charts.
trans-unit.target: 序列轴仅应用于三维图表。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> values that specifies the axis group.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup>指定轴组的值。

trans-unit.source: 3-D charts have only one set of axes.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表有只有一组轴。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A> without specifying parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet._HasAxisType> object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A>无需指定参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.HasAxis%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet._HasAxisType>对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Excel may create or delete axes if you change the chart type or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Axis.AxisGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Excel 可以创建或删除轴，如果更改图表类型或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Axis.AxisGroup%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The sheet before which the moved sheet will be placed.

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>before</c> if you specify <c>after</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>after</c>，则不能指定 <c>before</c>。

trans-unit.source: The sheet after which the moved sheet will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 移动工作表的放置位置之前的工作表。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify <c>after</c> if you specify <c>before</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 <c>before</c>，则不能指定 <c>after</c>。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> to another location in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 移至工作簿中的另一位置。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify either `Before` or `After`, Microsoft Office Excel creates a new workbook that contains the moved sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定`Before`或`After`，Microsoft Office Excel 创建新的工作簿包含移动的工作表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotLayout" /> that represents the placement of fields in a PivotTable report and the placement of axes in a PivotChart report.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotLayout" />，它表示数据透视图中字段的位置和数据透视图中轴的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotLayout" /> that represents the placement of fields in a PivotTable report and the placement of axes in a PivotChart report.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotLayout" />，表示数据透视图中字段的位置和数据透视图中轴的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is not a PivotChart report, the value of this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>不是数据透视图报表，此属性的值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PlotArea" /> object that represents the plot area of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PlotArea" /> object that represents the plot area of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PlotArea" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的绘图区。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PlotArea%2A> property of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to change the color of the border around the plot area of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PlotArea%2A>属性的当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>更改图表绘图区的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way columns or rows are used as data series on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上将列或行用作数据系列的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />。

trans-unit.source: For PivotChart reports, this property is read-only and always returns <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns>.
trans-unit.target: 对于数据透视图报表，此属性是只读的且始终返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PlotBy%2A> property to set the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to display data by rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PlotBy%2A>属性设置当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>若要按行显示数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether only visible cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否只绘制可见单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if only visible cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 如果只绘制可见单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if both visible and hidden cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 如果可见单元格和隐藏单元格都要绘制，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> object that represents the previous sheet.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> object that represents the previous sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet" /> 对象，表示前一个工作表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Next%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Previous%2A> properties to display the names of the next and previous sheets for the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Next%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Previous%2A>属性，以显示当前的下一步和上一个表名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of comment pages that will be printed for the current chart sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取要为当前图表工作表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of comment pages that will be printed for the current chart sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要为当前图表工作表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: Because charts and chart sheets do not support comments, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet.PrintedCommentPages%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet> object will always return zero.
trans-unit.target: 由于图表和图表工作表不支持注释，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet.PrintedCommentPages%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheet>对象将始终返回零。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始打印的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则打印从第一页开始。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此参数，则打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在打印对象前让 Microsoft Office Excel 调用打印预览，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> (or omitted) to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" />（或省略）时，立即打印对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>prToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>prToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to print to.
trans-unit.target: 要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only if <c>printToFile</c> is<see langword=" true" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <c>printToFile</c> 为 <see langword=" true" /> 时，才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Prints the chart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 打印 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中显示的图表。

trans-unit.source: "Pages" in the descriptions of `From` and `To` refers to printed pages— not overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: "页"中的说明`From`和`To`指打印页-不是所有页中的表或工作簿。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PrintOutEx%2A> method to print one copy of the first two pages of the chart sheet `Chart1` to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PrintOutEx%2A>方法要打印一份该图表工作表的前两页`Chart1`到默认打印机。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a chart sheet named `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为图表工作表`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: Shows a preview of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> as it would look when printed.
trans-unit.target: 显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 打印效果的预览。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PrintPreview%2A> method to preview the printout of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.PrintPreview%2A>方法若要预览的当前打印输出<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a case-sensitive password for the worksheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定工作表或工作簿的区分大小写的密码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, you can unprotect the worksheet or workbook without using a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则不使用密码就可以取消对工作表或工作簿的保护。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must specify the password to unprotect the worksheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: 否则，必须指定用来取消对工作表或工作簿的保护的密码。

trans-unit.source: If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the worksheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果忘记了密码，则无法取消对工作表或工作簿的保护。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place.
trans-unit.target: 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect shapes.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时保护形状。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect contents.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时保护内容。

trans-unit.source: For a chart, this protects the entire chart.
trans-unit.target: 对于图表而言，这将保护整个图表。

trans-unit.source: For a worksheet, this protects the locked cells.
trans-unit.target: 对于工作表而言，这将保护锁定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时保护方案。

trans-unit.source: This argument is valid only for worksheets.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅对工作表有效。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect the user interface, but not macros.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 可保护用户界面，但不保护宏。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, protection applies both to macros and to the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则同时对宏和用户界面应用保护。

trans-unit.source: Protects a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> so that it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 保护 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 以便不能对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: Use strong passwords that combine upper- and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 使用合并和小写字母、 数字和符号的强密码。

trans-unit.source: Weak passwords do not mix these elements.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。

trans-unit.source: Strong password: Y6dh!et5.
trans-unit.target: 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。

trans-unit.source: Weak password: House27.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码： House27。

trans-unit.source: Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down.
trans-unit.target: 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A> method to protect all contents of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A>方法以保护所有当前内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A> property to verify that the chart sheet is protected, and then prompts the user to remove protection from the chart sheet by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A>属性以验证该图表工作表受到保护，且然后将提示用户使用从该图表工作表中删除保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> are protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的内容是否受保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> are protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的内容受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This protects the entire <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 这将保护整个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A> method to protect all contents of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A>方法以保护所有当前内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A> property to verify that the chart sheet is protected, and then prompts the user to remove protection from the chart sheet by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A>属性以验证该图表工作表受到保护，且然后将提示用户使用从该图表工作表中删除保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether series formulas cannot be modified by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否无法修改系列公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if series formulas cannot be modified by the user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不能修改系列公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether shapes are protected on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上的形状是否受保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if shapes are protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果形状受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> formatting cannot be modified by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否无法修改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 格式设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> formatting cannot be modified by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户无法修改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 格式设置，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the **Object** command on the **Format** menu is disabled and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> elements cannot be added, moved, resized, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`、**对象**命令**格式**禁用菜单和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>无法添加、 移动、 调整大小，或删除元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether user-interface-only protection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否开启了只限用户界面的保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if user-interface-only protection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 如果开启了只限用户界面的保护，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: To turn on user interface protection, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Chart.Protect%2A> method with the `UserInterfaceOnly` argument set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开用户界面保护，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Chart.Protect%2A>方法替换`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> elements cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否不能选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> elements cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 元素，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, shapes cannot be added to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`，无法将形状添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Updates the cache of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的大小更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> axes are at right angles, independent of chart rotation or elevation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 轴是否成直角（与图表旋转角或仰角无关）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> axes are at right angles, independent of chart rotation or elevation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 轴成直角（与图表旋转角或仰角无关），则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to a 3-D line, column, or bar <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于三维行、 列或栏<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A> property to set the view perspective of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to 45 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A>属性设置的当前视图角度<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>为 45 度。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.RightAngleAxes%2A> property to `false` before setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.RightAngleAxes%2A>属性`false`之前设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Perspective%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的旋转角。

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the 3-D <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> (the rotation of the plot area around the z-axis, in degrees).
trans-unit.target: 三维 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的旋转角（绘图区绕 z 轴的旋转角，以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be from 0 to 360, except for 3-D bar charts, where the value must be from 0 to 44.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须在 0 到 360 之间，但三维条形图除外（其中该值必须在 0 到 44 之间）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 20.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 20。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Rotation%2A> property to display the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> without any rotation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Rotation%2A>属性来显示当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>而无需任何旋转。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path; if you do not, Microsoft Office Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可以包含完整路径；否则，Microsoft Office Excel 将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: The file format to use when you save the file.
trans-unit.target: 保存文件时要使用的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid choices, see the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.FileFormat" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效选项的列表，请参见 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook.FileFormat" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, the default format is the last file format specified; for a new file, the default is the format of the version of Excel being used.
trans-unit.target: 对于现有文件，默认格式为最后一种指定文件格式；对于新文件，默认格式为所用 Excel 版本的格式。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive string (no more than 15 characters) that indicates the protection password to be given to the file.
trans-unit.target: 一个区分大小写的字符串（不超过 15 个字符），指示为文件指定的保护密码。

trans-unit.source: The write-reservation password for this file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的写保护密码。

trans-unit.source: If a file is saved with the password and the password is not supplied when the file is opened, the file is opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存文件时指定了密码，但打开文件时没有提供密码，则该文件以只读方式打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a message when the file is opened, recommending that the file be opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在打开该文件时显示一条消息，建议以只读方式打开该文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a backup file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则创建备份文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add this workbook to the list of recently used files.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将工作簿添加到最近使用的文件列表中。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Not used in U.S. English Excel.
trans-unit.target: 不在美国使用英语 Excel。

trans-unit.source: Not used in U.S. English Excel.
trans-unit.target: 不在美国使用英语 Excel。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> saves files against the language of Excel (including control panel settings).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则按照 Excel（包括控制面板设置）的语言保存文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> (default) saves files against the language of Visual Basic for Applications (which is typically US English unless the VBA project where Workbooks.Open is run from is an old internationalized XL5/95 VBA project).
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" />（默认值）时，则用 Visual Basic for Applications 所使用的语言（通常为美国英语，除非从中运行 Workbooks.Open 的 VBA 项目是旧的国际化 XL5/95 VBA 项目）保存文件。

trans-unit.source: Saves changes to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> in a different file.
trans-unit.target: 将对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 所做的更改保存到另一个文件中。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SaveAs%2A> method to save an unprotected copy of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SaveAs%2A>方法以将保存当前的未受保护的副本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new chart template.
trans-unit.target: 新图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: Saves the chart on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> as a custom template in the list of available chart templates.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中的图表作为自定义模板保存在可用图表模板的列表中。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method saves the current chart to the user's chart template directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法将当前的图表保存到用户的图表模板目录。

trans-unit.source: If a UNC or URL is specified, the chart will be saved to the specified location instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 UNC 或 URL，则将保存图表到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要替换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Selects the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SelectEvent> event that displays a message box when the primary axis of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SelectEvent>显示一条消息的事件框中时的当前主轴<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>选择。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> data point is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 数据点的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SeriesChange> event that sets a point's border color to green when a data point of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SeriesChange>设置为绿色当前的数据点时的点的边框颜色的事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>更改。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the series.
trans-unit.target: 系列的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single series (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> object) or a collection of all the series (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SeriesCollection" /> collection) in the chart or chart group.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示图表或图表组中的单个系列（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> 对象）或所有系列的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SeriesCollection" /> 集合）。
