trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SeriesCollection%2A> method to add data labels to the first data series in the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SeriesCollection%2A>方法将数据标签添加到第一个数据系列存储在当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the graphic file.
trans-unit.target: 图形文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the background graphic for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的背景图形。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetBackgroundPicture%2A> method to set the background of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to an image file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetBackgroundPicture%2A>方法来设置当前的背景<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>到映像文件。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the name of the default chart template that will be used when creating new charts.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示在创建新图表时要使用的默认图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name can identify a chart in the gallery for a user-defined template, or it can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> values that specifies a built-in chart template.
trans-unit.target: 该名称可以标识用户定义的模板库中的图表，它也可以是指定内置图表模板的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the chart template that Microsoft Office Excel uses when creating new charts.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Microsoft Office Excel 在创建新图表时使用的图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType" /> values that specifies the type of element modification.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType" /> 值之一，指定元素修改的类型。

trans-unit.source: Modifies an element on the chart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 修改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中显示的图表的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A> method to modify an element of the chart according to the options specified by the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType` values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A>方法来修改指定的选项根据图表元素`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType`值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to hide the table legend, pass the value `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone` to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要隐藏表图例，将值传递`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone`到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The operations you can perform by using this method correspond to the following buttons on the **Layout** tab of the Ribbon when a chart is selected:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用此方法执行的操作对应于以下按钮上**布局**选项卡的功能区时选择图表：

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Labels** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**标签**组。

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Axes** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**轴**组。

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Analysis** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**分析**组。

trans-unit.source: The **Plot Area**, **Chart Wall**, and **Chart Floor** buttons in the **Background** group.
trans-unit.target: **绘图区**，**图表背景墙**，和**图表基底**按钮**后台**组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例应用可用于图表工作表中的图图表类型的第 10 个布局`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A> method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetElement%2A>方法应用更多布局更改： 设置图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式、 添加的水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为簇状的柱形二维图表工作表`Chart1`。

trans-unit.source: The range that contains the source data.
trans-unit.target: 包含源数据的范围。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way the data is to be plotted.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制数据的方式。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />。

trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的源数据范围。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetSourceData%2A> method to set the data source of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName> to a range on `Sheet1` that contains cells A1 through B5.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SetSourceData%2A>方法以设置当前的数据源<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>为工作区域`Sheet1`，其中包含通过 B5 A1 单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> object that represents all the shapes on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> 上的所有形状的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> object that represents all the shapes on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上的所有形状。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Shapes%2A> property to draw a doughnut shape on the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Shapes%2A>属性当前上绘制圆环图形状<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to display all field buttons on a PivotChart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中显示的数据透视图上显示所有字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display all field buttons on the specified PivotChart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在指定的数据透视图上显示所有字段按钮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A> property to `true` to display all field buttons on the specified PivotChart that is displayed on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A>属性`true`以显示所有字段按钮上显示的指定数据透视图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>。

trans-unit.source: Set the property to `false` to hide all field buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将属性设置为`false`若要隐藏的所有字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A> property corresponds to the **Hide All** command on the **Field Buttons** drop-down list of the **Analyze** tab in Excel, which is available when a PivotChart is selected.

trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to display axis field buttons on a PivotChart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在显示在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 上的数据透视图上显示轴字段按钮。

trans-unit.target: 此属性只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display axis field buttons on the specified PivotChart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在指定的数据透视图上显示轴字段按钮，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowAxisFieldButtons%2A>属性`true`显示轴字段按钮上显示的指定数据透视图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowAxisFieldButtons%2A>属性对应于**显示轴字段****按钮**命令**字段按钮**的下拉列表**分析**在 Excel 中，它在选定的数据透视图时才可用的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show the data labels when the value is greater than the maximum value on the value axis.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当值大于数值轴上的最大值时是否显示数据标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the data labels when the value is greater than the maximum value on the value axis; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当值大于数值轴上的最大值时显示数据标签，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you change the value axis in such a way that it became smaller than the size of the data points, you can use this property to set whether to show the data labels.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改中变得比的数据点的大小小数值轴，你可以使用此属性设置是否显示数据标签。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to 2-D charts only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于仅二维图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to display legend field buttons on a PivotChart that is displayed on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中显示的数据透视图上显示图例字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display all legend field buttons on the specified PivotChart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在指定的数据透视图上显示所有图例字段按钮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowLegendFieldButtons%2A> property to `true` to display legend field buttons on the specified PivotChart that is displayed on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowLegendFieldButtons%2A>属性`true`以显示图例字段按钮上显示的指定数据透视图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>。

trans-unit.source: Set the property to `false` to hide the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将属性设置为`false`隐藏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowLegendFieldButtons%2A> property corresponds to the **Show Legend Field Buttons** command on the **Field Buttons** drop-down list of the **Analyze** tab in Excel, which is available when a PivotChart is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ShowLegendFieldButtons%2A>属性对应于**显示图例字段按钮**命令**字段按钮**的下拉列表**分析**在 Excel 中，这是选项卡在选中某个数据透视图才可用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application domain for the assembly is about to unload.
trans-unit.target: 在准备卸载程序集的应用程序域时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示三维图表的侧面墙。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> 对象，表示三维图表的侧面墙。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SideWall%2A> property to format the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.SideWall%2A>端三维图表的墙进行格式设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the colors of the walls and floor of an existing 3-D chart sheet and sets the chart style to style 4.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例指定墙和现有的三维图表工作表下限的颜色，并设置样式为样式 4 的图表。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, the workbook must contain a chart sheet called `Chart1` of a 3-D type.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，该工作簿必须包含图表工作表调用`Chart1`的三维类型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the document is running and all the initialization code in the assembly has been run.
trans-unit.target: 在文档正在运行并且该程序集中的所有初始化代码都已运行之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The last thing to run in the constructor of the class that the user code is running in.
trans-unit.target: 要运行的用户代码运行中的类的构造函数中的最后一步。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> object for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> object for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains data about the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A common use for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Tag%2A> property is to store data that is closely associated with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Tag%2A>属性是与紧密关联的数据存储<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase>。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive password to use to unprotect the sheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消保护工作表或工作簿的区分大小写的密码。

trans-unit.source: If the sheet or workbook is not protected with a password, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果未用密码保护工作表或工作簿，则省略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this argument for a sheet that is protected with a password, you will be prompted for the password.
trans-unit.target: 如果对使用密码进行保护的工作表省略此参数，则您将被提示输入密码。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this argument for a workbook that is protected with a password, the method fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果对使用密码进行保护的工作簿省略此参数，则该方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: Removes protection from a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase" /> 中移除保护。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect if the sheet or workbook is not protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作表或工作簿不受保护，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你忘记了密码，则无法取消保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place.
trans-unit.target: 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A> method to protect all contents of the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Protect%2A>方法以保护所有当前内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A> property to verify that the chart sheet is protected, and then prompts the user to remove protection from the chart sheet by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.ProtectContents%2A>属性以验证该图表工作表受到保护，且然后将提示用户使用从该图表工作表中删除保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 确定该对象是否可见。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase.Walls%2A>属性设置权重和当前的墙的颜色<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ChartSheetBase?displayProperty=fullName>。
